member.summary: Gets the error response if there was an exception

member.name: P:ConfigWithStartWizard.Common.SubmitQuery.MaxResponseLength
member.summary: Gets and sets the (approx) maximum number of characters for the DEBUG response
member.remarks: Has no effect on the length of the actual response from online

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.Common.SubmitQuery.Exec(ConfigWithStartWizard.Models.OnlineQuery,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{ConfigWithStartWizard.Models.OnlineResultItem},System.Int32)

member.name: T:ConfigWithStartWizard.Common.StringToBoolConverter
member.summary: If the string length > 0 is "true" then true is returned, otherwise false.
member.remarks: If the string value "true" is passed as the parameter the returned bool is flipped

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.Common.StringToBoolConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts OnlineUri query string length to a bool. A query string length > 0 returns true
member.returns: Pass "true" as the parameter to flip (reverse) the returned bool (i.e. !true or !false)

member.name: T:ConfigWithStartWizard.Common.BoolToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Converts the given bool to a Visibility

member.name: T:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigWithStartWizardModule
member.summary: “Managed Configurations” allow branding of ArcGIS Pro meaning you can customize the splash and startup screens, application icon, and modify the runtime ArcGIS Pro User Interface to best fit your user’s business needs. This sample illustrates a configuration solution that shows various startup screen options in form of a wizard interface.
member.remarks: 1. Download the Community Sample data (see under the 'Resources' section for downloading sample data). The sample data contains a folder called 'C:\Data\Configurations\Projects' with sample data required for this solution. Make sure that the Sample data is unzipped in c:\data and "C:\Data\Configurations\Projects" is available. 1. In Visual Studio click the Build menu. Then select Build Solution. 1. This solution is using the **Newtonsoft.Json NuGet**. If needed, you can install the NuGet from the "NuGet Package Manager Console" by using this script: "Install-Package Newtonsoft.Json". 1. Click Start button to debug ArcGIS Pro. 1. ArcGIS Pro displays first the custom splash screen. 1. Pro will then display the startup screen utilizing a wizard style user interface. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup1.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in OutofBoxStartPage.xaml and OutofBoxStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup2.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in StockStartPage.xaml and StockStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup3.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in OnlineItemStartPage.xaml and OnlineItemStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup4.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in OnlineItemStartPage.xaml and OnlineItemStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup5.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in OnlineItemStartPage.xaml and OnlineItemStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup6.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in OnlineItemStartPage.xaml and OnlineItemStartPageViewModel.cs. ![UI](Screenshots/Startup7.png) 1. The code for this startup user control can be found in CaliforniaStartPage.xaml and CaliforniaStartPageViewModel.cs.

member.name: P:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigWithStartWizardModule.Current
member.summary: Retrieve the singleton instance to this module here

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigWithStartWizardModule.CanUnload
member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True

member.name: P:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.ApplicationName
member.summary: Replaces the default ArcGIS Pro application name

member.name: P:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.Icon
member.summary: Replaces the ArcGIS Pro Main window icon.

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.OnShowStartPage
member.summary: Called before ArcGIS Pro starts up. Replaces the default Pro start-up page (Optional)
member.returns: Implemented UserControl with start-up page functionality. Return null if a custom start-up page is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro start-up page will be displayed.

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.OnApplicationInitializing(System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs)
member.summary: During the start up this method is called after it is safe to access Portal and use ArcGIS.Desktop.Core. ArcGIS Pro Theme has already been set.
member.param: To cancel initialization, set the cancelEventArgs.Cancel property to true.

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.OnApplicationReady
member.summary: During the start up this method is called after the Application Window Start page is ready. From here on calls to ArcGIS.Desktop.Framework.Threading.Tasks.QueuedTask are safe. ArcGIS Pro Extension modules can now be accessed.

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.OnShowSplashScreen
member.summary: Called while ArcGIS Pro starts up. Replaces the default Pro splash screen. (Optional)
member.returns: Implemented Window with splash screen functionality. Return null if a custom splash screen is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro splash screen will be displayed.

member.name: M:ConfigWithStartWizard.ConfigurationManagerStartWizard.OnShowAboutPage
member.summary: Customized UserControl is displayed in ArcGIS Pro About property page. Allows to add information about this specific managed configuration.
member.returns: Implemented UserControl with about box information. Return null if a custom about box is not needed. Default ArcGIS Pro About box will be displayed.
